Articles.Content:
Good afternoon all!  I am trying to restore helmets to the Vostok and Gemini pods.  I've done some work in the part config. file with no luck.  Any ideas? 

 

Thanks
Since you are trying to modify the game, your question has been moved to the modding subforum. Good luck.

A simple ModuleManager patch to restore helmets in KV-X and MK 2 Command Pod: 

@INTERNAL[KV?_IVA|MK2POD_IVA]
{
	@MODULE[InternalSeat],*
	{
		@allowCrewHelmet = true
	}
}

If you don't want to use MM look into the Internal.cfgs (GameData\SquadExpansion\MakingHistory\Spaces\) and replace all "allowCrewHelmet = false" with "allowCrewHelmet = true".
